dict.acceptation: 丈夫；〈英〉管家；〈古〉节俭的管理人；船舶管理人；
节俭地使用；〈罕〉做…的丈夫；

sent.orig: She came to her husband's family and cried, because her husband had beat her.
sent.trans: 她来到婆家哭闹，因为老公打了她。

sent.orig: And at once-I come forward, her husband, and the husband wants love!
sent.trans: 可突然间，我走到她身边，我是丈夫，丈夫是需要爱的啊！

sent.orig: Let the husband the wife due benevolenceand likewise also the wife unto her husband.
sent.trans: 丈夫当用合宜之份待妻子，妻子待丈夫也要如此。

sent.orig: Married woman's husband can only put the incumbent's husband, compared with the next door.
sent.trans: 女人结婚后只能把现任的丈夫跟隔壁的丈夫比较。

sent.orig: The habits and customs of madam dissatisfaction husband, the figure of wife of husband pick on.
sent.trans: 太太不满丈夫的生活习惯，老公总是挑剔妻子的身材。
